price: 31. Kowuta epai ya falo oyo amilakisaki okati ya bato mabe.
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
